articles.author: Li Cohen
articles.title: Meet Pesto the Penguin, Australia's nearly 50-pound baby penguin capturing hearts worldwide with its hefty fluff - CBS News
articles.description: At just 9 months old, Pesto the baby king penguin weighs more than both his parents combined: "Our chonky king."
articles.content: An aquarium in Australia is now home to the biggest baby penguin it has ever seen. Pesto, a 9-month-old king penguin, has weighed in at just under 50 pounds — more than the weight of both his parents… [+3327 chars]
